Managing the Choice of Profession Raina:
Hello! Can ask me about everything that is connected with subclasses. What do You want from me?
For assistance to the forces of the gods left in the same condition the level of a subclass of, you can change the class. Change the profession of a subclass of (a Certificate is required on the Change of Occupation)
New subclass of is created at the 40-m level. Add subclass (recreate)
When changing a subclass of level is reset to 40. Add subclass after removal (reset)
